mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ygf_long_short_link lsl WHERE lsl.shortLink = #{shortLink}
SELECT * FROM ygf_long_short_link lsl WHERE lsl.shortLink LIKE #{shortLink} ORDER BY lsl.time DESC
SELECT * FROM ygf_long_short_link lsl WHERE lsl.longLink = #{longLink}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.total)total,GROUP_CONCAT(a.uv)uv,GROUP_CONCAT(a.ipnum)ipnum,GROUP_CONCAT(a.oklink)oklink,GROUP_CONCAT(a.errorlink)errorlink,GROUP_CONCAT(a.time)xData FROM ( SELECT COUNT(sr.id)total,COUNT(DISTINCT sr.cookie)uv,count(DISTINCT sr.ip)ipnum,SUM(if(IFNULL(sr.status,0)=0 AND IFNULL(sr.id,0) != 0,1,0))oklink, SUM(if(IFNULL(sr.status,0)=1 AND IFNULL(sr.id,0) != 0,1,0)) errorlink,cale.time FROM (SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(c.date,"%m/%d "),IF(LENGTH(h.hours)=1,CONCAT("0",h.hours),h.hours),":00") time,c.date,h.hours FROM (SELECT ygf_calendar.date FROM ygf_calendar WHERE ygf_calendar.date >= DATE(date_sub(CAST(#{end} AS datetime),INTERVAL +24 HOUR)) AND ygf_calendar.date <= CAST(#{end} AS date) ) c , ygf_hours h WHERE (c.date = DATE(date_sub(CAST(#{end} AS datetime),INTERVAL +24 HOUR)) AND h.hours > HOUR(date_sub(CAST(#{end} AS datetime),INTERVAL +24 HOUR))) OR ( c.date = DATE(CAST(#{end} AS datetime)) AND h.hours <= HOUR(CAST(#{end} AS datetime))) ) cale LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM ygf_dlj_search_record recod WHERE recod.searchLong = #{longUrl} AND recod.time >= date_sub(CAST(#{end} AS datetime),INTERVAL +24 HOUR) AND recod.time <= CAST(#{end} AS datetime) ) sr ON cale.time = DATE_FORMAT(sr.time,"%m/%d %h:00") GROUP BY cale.time ORDER BY cale.date,cale.hours )a;
SELECT COUNT(1)total,COUNT(DISTINCT rec.ip)ip,COUNT(DISTINCT rec.cookie)uv FROM ygf_dlj_search_record rec WHERE rec.searchLong = #{longUrl}
